front.title: IANA Allocation Guidelines for TCP and UDP Port Numbers

abstract.t: This document defines the IANA guidelines for registering new portnumber values for use with the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP)and User Datagram Protocol (UDP). It provides clear processes forthe TCP and UDP port number registries, important for their long-termmanagement. It updates RFC2780 by replacing Sections 8 and 9.1 ofthat RFC.
